ModMetaData.name: ED-More Vanilla Turrets
ModMetaData.author: Jaxxa, Original by: Marnador
ModMetaData.description:
Version: 02.00.02
This is a mod that adds more turret variations with the attempt to keep their vanilla art style.
This is based on "More Vanilla Turrets" by Marnador that has now been updated to Alpha 16. You are probably better off grabbing it Here: https://ludeon.com/forums/index.php?topic=9521 or Here:http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=730528968
Thanks to retep998 for committing improvements on Github. Alpha 16 update by KingPin
